item.title: Dynamic Lion set to miss at least a month with ankle sprain
item.description: Zac Bailey will be out of action for between four and six weeks

item.title: Forward planning: Dees lock gun in for four more years
item.description: Melbourne has extended Jacob van Rooyen's contract till 2029

item.title: Injury-plagued Hawk set to play VFL, veteran's return on hold
item.description: Changkuoth Jiath will return in the reserves this weekend, but Luke Breust faces another fortnight on the sidelines

item.title: AFL confirms dates for 2024 free agency, trade and draft periods
item.description: The League has locked in the dates for the 2024 Continental Tyres AFL Trade Period and the 2024 AFL Draft

item.title: Crows key defender in doubt to face Bombers
item.description: After getting through Adelaide's stunning win against Carlton Jordon Butts may miss this round

item.title: King set to miss, Lyon dismisses Bulldogs criticism
item.description: Ross Lyon isn't buying into criticism of the Western Bulldogs or its coach, Luke Beveridge

item.title: 'Our local community': Swans shocked by stabbing tragedies
item.description: John Longmire reflects on the recent events in Sydney and looks ahead of Sunday's game against the Suns

item.title: Beveridge dismisses talk of discontent, insists Dogs can contend
item.description: The Bulldogs believe they can contend in 2024, according to coach Luke Beveridge

item.title: Suns to challenge defender's four-game ban
item.description: Sean Lemmens has been cited for a dangerous tackle on a Box Hill opponent in the VFL

item.title: Players are 'manipulating' rules to win free kicks, says star Lion
item.description: Josh Dunkley says players around the competition are making the most of rules allowing them to win free kicks from vigorous tackles

item.title: Murphy ponders next move after retiring on concussion advice
item.description: Collingwood defender calls it quits following head knock sustained in 2023 Grand Final
